extendedInfo.description: SUPER SALE! Upgrade to the most powerful version of the TV & Movie Guide app, now for the special holiday-only price of 99 CENTS (50% off already discounted price!).â Free updates and upgrades for life!â Upgrade to remove ALL ADS!â Upgrade to "follow" each of your favourite shows, just like Twitter!â See cinema times for up to 4 weeks in advance!â See movie previews for up to 1 year in advance!â Pay TV channels coming soon to Upgrade users only!â Made by eBroadcast - Australia's #1 online TV guideUpdate to the most powerful TV & Movie Guide Australia app and unlock all of our TV & Movie guide features, plus no advertisements."Fantastic work" âââââ - Paul"Great all in one app, no need for any other" âââââ - Giorgio"Best application i've ever had" âââââ - eglathangionDownload the latest TV times and cinema sessions to your Android phone and get all your viewing needs in one place!TV & Movie Guide Australia: Pro is the ultimate 2-in-1 app that will allow you to view what's on TV and look up cinema session times across Australia, from your Android phone. In this complete PRO version, you can "Follow" your favourite TV shows (we'll show you when your favourite TV show is next on!) and enjoy a completely ad-free app!Australian TV features:â Free updates for life!â Lists all free-to-air channels in Australia.â Grid view: You can swipe up/down/sideways to view what's on.â "Follow" your favourite show; set reminders so you never forget to watch!â Customised to suit your needs - only view the channels you want!â Share recommendations with friends.â Completely Ad-Free!Australian Movie features:â Free updates for life!â View only your local cinemas - customisable in "Settings"â Four week rolling guide!â Previews of upcoming releases a year in advance!â Trailers, IMDB and official websites!â Top Ten Movies at the Box Office!â Share recommendations with friends!â Completely Ad-Free!We love feedback, so please leave a review after you download!NOTE: If you receive an "Unable to connect to eBroadcast error" please try uninstalling and reinstalling your app (it is free to do so under the same iTunes account) to clear any issues, before contacting us for further help. Thanks guys!If you are having problems or need help, just contact us:support@ebroadcast.com.auhttp://www.ebroadcast.com.auhttp://www.facebook.com/ebroadcasthttp://www.twitter.com/eBroadcastAU

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app. Looks great and very functional. Wish there was a view to simultaneously display current and upcoming shows easily however. -Running ICS on Galaxy Nexus-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not all channels, bad support
reviews.comment: Previously had the free version and all channels were there. Thought I\'d support the developers and buy the Pro version. There are about 4 channels missing. I\'ve emailed the developers twice but still haven\'t had a reply (many weeks have elapsed)    Don\'t waste your money!
reviews.author: Karalyn Patrick

reviews.title: Hangs
reviews.comment: When in Movie Times and I change the date to the next day, I hit Done and the hour glass stays displayed forever, that is, the app hangs. I\'m using a Bauhn tablet.
reviews.author: Alex Kouvaras

reviews.title: TV & Movie Guide Australia Pro
reviews.comment: All I can say it is really Great, on my Samsung Galaxy Y. I give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: stephen Russ

reviews.title: Works and does what\'s
reviews.comment: In the description..has a reminder which I need, if only it didn\'t create a calender event and gave a notifications pop up or status bar alert, it would be rockin!  it has everything else needed to view, 4cast tv shows as well as what\'s on Now... Needs a UI polish badly though & a few features added...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average app
reviews.comment: Slow. Takes forever to show TV program for a different day even on wifi. No updates. Reminder title is full of useless crap like the time \"ebroadcast\" I just need the title of the show. Can\'t follow programs like formula 1 racing. Very basic app. Not worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Tv/Cinema guide (SGSi9000)
reviews.comment: I\'ve had a few TV Guide apps , but this is hands down the best!! Very smooth and quick to load! Brilliant work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just one thing though...
reviews.comment: Great app but would love it to have \'keyword search\' where you type in a word or show title & when it\'s eventually on, it will appear in your reminder or \'following\' so you know it\'s on without needing to search for it everyday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Defy
reviews.comment: one has to look into each channel to see respective guide!! like, its the long way of doing things!? Also reminder notifications tell you the name of the show but not the channel? Requiring me to look back in to find it!! Just because its an app, before I opened a webpage that showed everything on one page.. Regards
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hangs ... it\'s a problem
reviews.comment: App hangs on my Galaxy Nexus when I select a date to view.
reviews.author: Lee Frake

reviews.comment: Excellent display of TV program info. I hope developers will enable a simple & direct trigger of alarm or chosen specific ringtone for reminders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice work - 4.5 Stars
reviews.comment: Have been using the free version app for months now. Works really well. Decided to buy to support dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more functions
reviews.comment: Desperately needs a search function. Also it would be cool if the reminder function had the option of setting an alarm just prior to the show\'s starting time. Otherwise it\'s a pretty good app. I don\'t feel as though I wasted my money. Looking forward to PayTV channels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Glitchy. does not change date properly, all the shows I was following dissapeared from my list and now I cant find them again. Could really use a search function to find out when my favorite shows are on. In short most tvs have a better guide build in.
reviews.author: Christian O

reviews.title: Australian tv guide.
reviews.comment: The best. Reminders doesn\'t put in the channel when it comes up. It\'s on their to-do list. Add it manually. Galaxy S. Full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs new theme
reviews.comment: The app presents the correct information but the UI needs updating. Using the gingerbread theme in 2013 is unacceptable. Not only does it look worse it is less user friendly. If the app used the holo theme it would easily be 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update
reviews.comment: Trying to see past the current day just gets stuck loading. Needs tablet support or at least landscape view.
reviews.author: Simon Giles

reviews.title: Great, but needs search
reviews.comment: Great prog guide, but would like to be able to search for a partucular show.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app but
reviews.comment: When I set a reminder it does not tell me which channel to switch to. Bought premium version hoping for that. Can I have my $2 back ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: average but ok
reviews.comment: doesn\'t up the next day early enough i get up at 5 am and it wont go past 5.30am to 6 abit useless
reviews.author: Larry Herron
